txt.en: Nanoth can be found in Bâr Húrin.\n\nYou should speak with Nanoth.
Roving Threat: Shardrágh, the Morgul Siege-beast
The forces of Morgul Vale have made their way to South Ithilien and Osgiliath, including Shardrágh, a great siege-beast from Minas Morgul.
Shardrágh can be found somewhere in South Ithilien or Osgiliath.\n\nYou should defeat Shardrágh.
'You have defeated Shardrágh?! You and your kinsmen have done a great service to the Rangers of Ithilien and the people of Gondor. I shall not forget your deeds.'

'Let me share with you information on Shardrágh. He is a massive Morgul-troll, as strong as the great beasts that pull the Morgul seige equipment to war. Shardrágh has been seen wandering South Ithilien then returning to Osgiliath. I am not certain to what this creature's mission is - perhaps he just awaits orders for the Morgul-host to continue its western assault. Something must be done about Shardrágh before he is able use his strength in battle over the days to come.'
